article_html: Four of the pro-Vladimir Putin bikers known as Night Wolves arrive at the site of the former Dachau concentration camp in Germany on Monday. They stopped off on their ride from Moscow to Berlin to mark the 70th anniversary of the Soviet victory over Nazi Germany. 'All we have with us is peace,' says one of the bikers, speaking in German with a Russian accent
text: Four of the pro-Vladimir Putin bikers known as Night Wolves arrive at the site of the former Dachau concentration camp in Germany on Monday. They stopped off on their ride from Moscow to Berlin to mark the 70th anniversary of the Soviet victory over Nazi Germany. 'All we have with us is peace,' says one of the bikers, speaking in German with a Russian accent
title: Pro-Putin bikers at site of Dachau concentration camp – video
